title: DeLallo Organic Whole Wheat Farfalle, Bow Ties Pasta, 1lb Bag, 16-Pack
features: Commonly known as bow ties, Farfalle are actually named for their “butterfly” shape. This prized pasta cooks up deliciously al dente because of their pinched middles.
Perfect for lighter sauces, hot or cold, and pair well with chopped vegetables and other small ingredients
Made with an exclusive blend of the highest quality durum wheat with a high gluten content and extruded with bronze dies to create a rougher surface that better absorbs and captures sauces
Made in an egg and nut free facility. Vegan. Contains wheat.
description: What could be more delicate than a butterfly? Organic Whole Wheat Farfalle is the butterfly of pasta forms, winging its graceful way across plates of marinara or pesto sauce, or joining brightly colored summer vegetables in a cold salad for the picnic table.

title: Fiber up your family meals with GoodWheat Pasta!
